channel.title: font on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in font on Today I Learned

item.description: That in Chrome/chromium you can view the actually-rendered font by inspecting an element view computed properties source: https://stackoverflow.com/a/31254584/6571327

How to subset fonts: # in a virtualenv pip install fonttools brotli zopfli pyftsubset --help see: https://fonttools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/subset/index.html#initial-glyph-set-specification https://markoskon.com/creating-font-subsets/#available-tools https://clagnut.com/blog/2418/ https://wakamaifondue.com/beta/ Also, optical-sized variable fonts look great.
